description: This is the clarity table for Infection Control Workqueue functionality. It contains the review information for a result.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: WKQUEUE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This stores user group of a workqueue. This is meant to be used in conjunction with the Workqueue Type parameter from Reporting Workbench reports from the Infection Control Find Results template.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Infection Preventionist


Pharmacist


NHSN C. diff Reviewer


NHSN MRSA Reviewer


NHSN CephR-Klebsiella Reviewer


NHSN MSSA Reviewer


NHSN VRE Reviewer


NHSN CRE-E. coli Reviewer


NHSN CRE-Klebsiella Reviewer


NHSN MDR-Acinetobacter Reviewer


NHSN CRE-Enterobacter Reviewer


NHSN CAUTI Reviewer


NHSN CLABSI Reviewer

columns.name: WKQUEUE_REVIEW_TIME_DTTM
columns.description: This stores the review instant for a result. This is the time at which a user clicked the "Reviewed" button from a Reporting Workbench Workqueue. Each instant is specific to the Workqueue Type and User ID.

columns.name: WKQUEUE_REV_USER_ID
columns.description: The reviewer for a result. This is related to the review instant and the workqueue type.

columns.name: WKQUEUE_REVIEW_C_NAME
columns.description:
This stores the review action for a result. This is the action a user took from a Reporting Workbench Workqueue.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Review


Unreview

columns.name: WKQUEUE_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
This stores a result review reason. This is the discrete reason a user documented while reviewing the result. Each reason is specific to a workqueue and user ID.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Present on admission


Present on insertion


Does not meet NHSN criteria


Contaminant


Sent to Department of Health


Infection case created

columns.name: WKQUEUE_COMMENT
columns.description: This column stores the free text result review comment. This is the comment a user documented while reviewing the result. Each comment is specific to a workqueue and user ID.
